caption.p: Cycling performance of symmetrical cells with bare Zn foil and ZIF-8@Zn electrodes in a and b 2 M ZnSO 4 and c and d 2 M ZnSO 4 + 0.1 M MnSO 4 electrolytes. Applied current density is 0.25 mA cm −2 with Zn deposition/dissolution capacity of 0.05 mAh cm −2. b, d The first-cycle voltage profiles of symmetrical cells with bare Zn foil and ZIF-8@Zn electrodes
